name: customer-service-system
description: 客服系统 - 前后端一体化开发环境

scripts.setup:backend: cargo install cargo-watch || echo cargo-watch already installed
scripts.dev:full: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "🦀Backend,⚛️Frontend,📦SDK" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan,magenta" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run sdk:dev"
scripts.build:full: concurrently "npm run backend:build" "npm run frontend:build" "npm run sdk:build"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../websocket-sdk && npm install
